a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Urban improved water usage vs. rural water usage, 2022
Improved drinking water sources are those that have the potential to deliver safe water by nature of their design
and construction, and include: piped water, boreholes or tubewells, protected dug wells, protected springs,
rainwater, and packaged or delivered water.
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP) (2024)
